attributes.action: Give us the odds on the first attempt to subvert the Press through the new Press Charter rules being made by politicians.
attributes.additional_details: With Mr Speaker STILL using taxpayer pounds to pay lawyers to make cases to prevent taxpayers from finding out about how taxpayer pounds are STILL being stolen and defrauded, through the MPs expenses scam, it MUST be odds on that even more taxpayer pounds are about to be paid to lawyers, by our dishonourable electeds, so that even LESS information about where their taxpayer pounds are going, gets through to them.
